text: But they shall fly upon the shoulders of the Philistines toward the west; they shall spoil them of the east together: they shall lay their hand upon Edom and Moab; and the children of Ammon shall obey them.11.14 them of: Heb. the children of11.14 they shall lay…: Heb. Edom and Moab shall be the laying on of their hand11.14 shall obey…: Heb. their obedience
